snippet: Alex Rodriguez’s bases-loaded homer in the eighth tied the score at 4-4 and gave him a share of first place on the career grand slam list with Lou Gehrig in the Yankees’ win in Atlanta.
abstract: New York Yankees defeat Atlanta Braves, 6-4, powered by Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez's grand slam, tying him with Lou Gehrig at 23 for first on the career list.
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez’s bases-loaded homer in the eighth tied the score at 4-4 and gave him a share of first place on the career grand slam list with Lou Gehrig in the Yankees’ win in Atlanta.

headline.seo: Rodriguez Matches Gehrig With 23 Grand Slams in Yanks’ 6-4 Win Over Braves
headline.main: Rodriguez Ties Gehrig’s Grand Slam Record in Win Over Braves
headline.print_headline: Rodriguez Ties Gehrig for No. 1 in Grand Slams
